member.name: T:GenerationAttributes.JavaListenerInterfaceAttribute
member.summary: When added on a C# interface [CS_interface]: 1. Generates identical interface in java with all the methods. 2. Generates a class named [CS_interface]Proxy that implements the generated java interface. Generated class extends tlplib.JavaListenerProxy

member.name: F:GenerationAttributes.JavaListenerInterfaceAttribute.Module
member.summary: Android module the code will be generated in

member.name: T:GenerationAttributes.JavaMethodAttribute
member.summary: Can only be used inside class with JavaClass attribute. Generates a method inside that java class. Method should not have an implementation. Compiler generates C# method body at compile-time. When you call this method in C#, it gets redirected to Java automatically.

member.name: F:GenerationAttributes.JavaMethodAttribute.MethodBody
member.summary: Method body in generated Java code.

member.name: T:GenerationAttributes.JavaClassAttribute
member.summary: Generates a java class with provided imports and body. When you instantiate this object, then a mirror object is also instantiated in Java. You should use on methods inside this class.

member.name: F:GenerationAttributes.JavaClassAttribute.Module
member.summary: Android module the code will be generated in

member.name: F:GenerationAttributes.JavaClassAttribute.Imports
member.summary: Java code that will be put at top of the generated file

member.name: F:GenerationAttributes.JavaClassAttribute.ClassBody
member.summary: Java code that will be put in the generated class

member.name: T:GenerationAttributes.JavaBindingAttribute
member.summary: Use this on classes that extend Binding, AndroidJavaObject and AndroidJavaProxy. This attribute is used by to determine what object type this is in Java when generating code.

member.name: F:GenerationAttributes.JavaBindingAttribute.JavaClass
member.summary: Full java class name of associated java object
